狀.definition: (bound form) form; appearance; shape; (bound form) state; condition; (bound form) to describe; (bound form) written complaint; lawsuit; (bound form) certificate

狀元.definition: top scorer in the palace examination (highest rank of the Imperial examination system); see 榜眼[bang3 yan3] and 探花[tan4 hua1]; top scorer in college entrance examination 高考[gao1 kao3]; (fig.) the most brilliantly talented person in the field; leading light

狀告.definition: to sue; to take to court; to file a lawsuit

狀態.definition: condition; state; state of affairs; CL:個|个[ge4]
